issue.title: Allow IP address of interface to be changed

content.raw:
at this point, I think I will call this a "wontfix" since we are past the 2013 DRC and this would require a firmware update to the hands, since unfortunately the microcontroller in the hand frame has the IP/port of the controlling computer hard-coded. If adding a virtual interface is impossible for your use cases, let me know and I can provide firmware tweaks and new flash images. 

However... burning these firmware images will require using the bootloader on the hand frame, and when the bootloader comes up, it always uses hard-coded IP/port values for the controlling computer, which would require that the hands are connected to a machine with a physical or virtual interface at the same ip/port as ATLAS.
